name: Meepo
title: Geomancer
lore: Meepo is a scoundrel who discovered an artifact that split him into multiple selves. If one dies, all die.

earthbind.name: Earthbind
earthbind.description: Throws a net that roots enemies in place.

poof.name: Poof
poof.description: Teleports Meepo to another Meepo, dealing damage at both locations.

ransack.name: Ransack
ransack.description: Each Meepo's attacks steal HP from enemies.

dividedWeStand.name: Divided We Stand
dividedWeStand.description: Meepo summons additional clones of himself that share experience but not items.
